title: Eugene's Wedding
summary:
Hostinger on pushes.
CMS config and admin files are committed; new people/events layout partial is in the tree; public assets regenerated.
Next steps:

Add GitHub repo secrets: FTP_HOST, FTP_USERNAME, FTP_PASSWORD, FTP_PATH (and FTP_PORT if not 21).
Push the commit to GitHub: git push.
On the next push, the workflow will build and deploy automatically to your FTP target.
